body: PyTorch 1.6+ requires CUDA 9.2+. Support for CUDA 9.1 and older was dropped in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/36848 and documented in the README in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/38977, but not properly checked for until https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/61462 which is why I didn't catch it until now.
title: py-torch: CUDA 9.2+ required
